code_snippet:
def test_override_with_env(self):
    """Ensure environment variable used if no files provided."""
    _, tmp_file = tempfile.mkstemp(prefix='openstack', suffix='.setup')
    with open(tmp_file, 'w') as fh:
        fh.write("foo\nbar")
    self.useFixture(
        fixtures.EnvironmentVariable('PBR_REQUIREMENTS_FILES', tmp_file))
    self.assertEqual(['foo', 'bar'],
                     packaging.parse_requirements())

mapped_sequence.description: Creates temporary file that is not deleted on close
Basic file opening operations for writing (normal writing, binary writing)
Writing data to files (strings or bytes)
